001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
005import java.util.Set;
006
007/**
008 * Pluggable module describing how to detect and reconstruct a specific protocol.
009 *
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public interface ProtocolModule {
013  /**
014   * Returns the protocol identifier served by this module.
015   *
016   * @return protocol id
017   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
018   */
019  ProtocolId id();
020
021  /**
022   * Provides well-known server ports that hint at this protocol.
023   *
024   * @return immutable set of default server ports
025   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
026   */
027  Set<Integer> defaultServerPorts();
028
029  /**
030   * Checks whether the given byte preface matches this protocol signature.
031   *
032   * @param prefacePeek sampled bytes from the beginning of a flow
033   * @return {@code true} when the signature matches
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */
036  boolean matchesSignature(byte[] prefacePeek);
037
038  /**
039   * Creates a new {@link MessageReconstructor} for the specified flow.
040   *
041   * @param flow five-tuple associated with the session
042   * @param clock clock port used for timestamping
043   * @param metrics metrics sink for protocol-specific counters
044   * @return initialized reconstructor ready for {@link MessageReconstructor#onStart()}
045   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
046   */
047  MessageReconstructor newReconstructor(FiveTuple flow, ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics);
048}
